TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EventLogNotFoundException extends System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogException

Docs.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when a requested event log (usually specified by the name of the event log or the path to the event log file) does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Examples For example code using this class, see [How To: Access and Read Event Information](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/14db3375-d305-49ae-aa24-aedbe906e76c).
